text.value: Stand next to animal if possible
Clarification if required or GPS not animal location
Provide best guess of actual incident time
What's underneath and around the animal?
bays, estuaries, enclosed shallow soft sediments
below mean spring high water mark
reef crest, dry at low tide
reef flat, dry at low tide
The animal's activity at the time of observation
floating (dead, sick, drifting, unable to dive)
beach washed (dead, sick, stranded on beach)
carcass or butchered remains found removed from coast
Expert opinion based on available evidence
Any signs of injuries or distinguishing features?
Show entire feature in good detail
front left flipper, 1st scale from body
front left flipper, 2nd scale from body
front left flipper, 3rd scale from body
front right flipper, 1st scale from body
front right flipper, 2nd scale from body
front right flipper, 3rd scale from body
How recent does the damage appear?
Photo of tag or sample ID
Show tag ID if visible or sample ID
The alphanumeric tag or sample ID

QLD Titanium series K flipper tag
QLD Titatium series T flipper tag
Hawaii Inst Mar Biol Inconel flipper tag

The status this tag was seen in, or brought into
CCL must be positive and below 3 m (3000 mm)
CCW must be positive and below 2 m (2000 mm)
TC must be positive and below 1 m (1000 mm)
MHW must be positive and below 1 m (1000 mm)
